Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] GNOMES

<< File: ATT00002.htm >> Hey as a gnome Necro do we really only have 2 choices for how we look?

YELLOW ROBE or CLOTH/MAGIC ARMOR etc . . .

that kinda stinks, are there any OTHER robes we can buy beside the YELLOW that will fit us????
